name: Greenhouse Roughhousing (Final)
description:
An old greenhouse maintanence worker needs some help; he's too old to properly grab his robot AI assistance. So he called in someone to help him. Maybe YOU can help the recipient reach the goal?

________________________________________________________

THIS IS JUST A PROJECT FOR MY COLLEGE CLASS!! SO OF COURSE IT'S NOT GONNA BE THE BEST QUALITY!!

1) I don't know how to get rid of Unity-chan's menus. They were beyond the skill level I had at the time of making this, and I SEVERELY underestimated the aspects of the asset.

2) The invincibility item on LV4 is implied to the player tip-toeing at such fast speeds, movement's not an issue. That's why there's no animation

3) Credits at the end. Violet Beauregarde (Willy Wonka, Roahd Dahl); this credit piece is the one thing I forgot to include.

4) I was concerned w/ functionality over aesthetic. So there was no enemy animation. Also past my current skill level.

5) Apologies for the tiny UI text. They were normal-sized in-engine, and I don't know what happened.
